dict.string:
: ${TM_LINE_INDEX:=$((TM_COLUMN_NUMBER-1))} # backwards compatibility
# if there's a selection, output that (to have it duplicated) otherwise # split the current line around the caret and output “right, left” to # duplicate the line, leaving the caret in the same place on the new line
echo -n "${TM_SELECTED_TEXT:-${TM_CURRENT_LINE:TM_LINE_INDEX} ${TM_CURRENT_LINE:0:TM_LINE_INDEX}}"
